text: The 2007 edition of the Vattenfall Cyclassics cycle race took place in the German city of Hamburg on August 19, 2007. Alessandro Ballan won the race, beating last years winner Óscar Freire. ==General Standings== ===2007-19-08: Hamburg-Hamburg, 229,1 km=== {| class="wikitable" ! !Name !Team !Time !UCI ProTour Points |- |1 |'''''' |'''''' |align=right|5h 21' 05" |align="center"|40 |- |2 | | |align=right| s.t |align="center"|30 |- |3 | | |align=right| s.t |align="center"|25 |- |4 | | |align=right| s.t |align="center"|20 |- |5 | |Milram |align=right| s.t |align="center"|15 |- |6 | | |align=right| s.t |align="center"|11 |- |7 | | |align=right| s.t |align="center"|7 |- |8 | | |align=right| s.t |align="center"|5 |- |9 | | |align=right| s.t |align="center"|3 |- |10 | |Wiesenhof-Felt |align=right| s.t |align="center"|N/A |- |} Olaf Pollack received no UCI ProTour points because his team, Team Wiesenhof-Felt, is not part of the UCI ProTour. ==References== ==External links== *Race website 2007 Category:2007 UCI ProTour Vattenfall
